post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Oracle 11i Applications Developer
About the Job
Kovasys Inc. (Kovasys.com IT Recruitment ) is a leading IT Recruitment / Headhunting Agency in Toronto since 2005. We were recently recognized and featured in such publications as CIO Magazine, Computer World Canada, La Presse, Le Devoir and The Montreal Gazette.



We are currently seeking an Oracle 11i Experienced Programmer for our client, a Manufacturer of Aluminium Products used in the Construction Industry.

Responsibilities:
Your main responsibilities are to provide programming support in design and development for ongoing system modifications on the full range  of Oracle 11i business suites with specific expertise in Order Management and Manufacturing.

Technical Requirements:
Candidates must have technical qualifications in Oracle 9i or higher,
SQL and PL/SQL,
Reports and Forms,
Knowledge of IBM AIX operating systems

Language Skills:
Strong communications skills, both oral and written, are required.

APPLY NOW: http://www.kovasys.com/tabid/91/jobid/677/language/en-US/Default.aspx
post.title: Oracle 11i Applications Developer
